Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 not out off just 26 balls.
Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 59 off 44 balls.
India scored 192 for 2 in their 20 overs.
Hong Kong managed 152 for 5 in their 20 overs.
Ravindra Jadeja's direct hit run-out of Nizakat Khan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India finished as the top team in Group A.
Suryakumar Yadav's ability to change his shot at the last second was highlighted by Robin Uthappa.
Avesh Khan and Arshdeep Singh had expensive spells, conceding 53 and 44 runs respectively from their four overs.
